item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: @Francesco: this query has a very specific layout of course. But a CTE is basically just a subquery, so I can imagine there are other queries where this trick can be applied. The important factors here are that a subquery is joined against another table, and that the subquery is either calculated before or after the join in the query plan. If after, there might be performance issues because there is no join predicate, as you can see in one of the query plans.
